name: Happiny

evolution.description: Happiny can evolve into Chansey at level 8 and above with the help of an Oval Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Playhouse Pokémon. It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.
